reviewtext: Great if you need to work on an old school computer tower and don't have an adapter plug for your miniDin6 plug.As most of the old school users will remember, these adapters came with every keyboard and computer system until the motherboard manufacturers finally switched over the standard input type. It was a welcome change too!These plugs are very handy to have especially if you do any computer work such as repairs, mods or upgrades. it's a tool you'll suffer without if you don't keep it in your toolbox.
